functions.name: get_stock_fundamentals
functions.description:
get_stock_fundamentals(symbol: str) -> dict - Get fundamental data for a given stock symbol using yfinance API.

    Args:
    symbol (str): The stock symbol.

    Returns:
    dict: A dictionary containing fundamental data.

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, TSLA) for which fundamental data is requested.

functions.name: weather_report
functions.description: Get the current weather for a location.

location.description: The name of the city or location to get the weather for.

functions.name: get_stock_data
functions.description: Fetch stock market data for an exchange.

exchange.description: The stock exchange symbol (e.g., NASDAQ, NYSE) to fetch data for.

functions.name: search_youtube
functions.description: Search YouTube for a specific topic.

topic.description: The topic or keywords to search for on YouTube.

functions.name: send_to_ai
functions.description: Handle creative prompts like jokes or stories.

prompt.description: The creative prompt for the AI, such as a joke, story, or poem.

functions.name: app_runner
functions.description: Open the specified application by name.

app_name.description: The name of the application to open.

functions.name: open_github
functions.description: Open GitHub in a web browser.

functions.name: open_instagram
functions.description: Open Instagram in a web browser.

functions.name: open_youtube
functions.description: Open YouTube in a web browser.

functions.name: private_mode
functions.description: Search in the incognito or private mode for a specific topic.

topic.description: The topic to search for in incognito mode.

functions.name: make_a_call
functions.description: Make a phone call to the provided contact name.

name.description: The name of the contact to call.
